interpretation: The "herb" card represents growth, renewal, and the cycle of life. Just as plants regenerate and flourish with each passing season, this card reminds us of our own potential for growth and transformation. It can also symbolize healing and the restorative powers of nature. In a reading, the "herb" card suggests that the querent may be on the cusp of a new chapter in their life, one that will require them to be flexible and adapt to changing circumstances. They may also need to tap into their inner strength and resilience in order to weather any challenges that come their way. The "herb" card encourages the querent to embrace change and to trust that they have the resources they need to thrive. Associated keywords include: growth, renewal, regeneration, healing, flexibility, adaptability, resilience, change.
